actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize Veterans Administration police officers to enforce State and local traffic laws on Veterans Administration property.

summary.text: Amends Federal administrative procedure provisions relating to the Veterans Administration (VA) to authorize VA police officers to enforce State and local traffic laws on VA property. (Currently, such officers are authorized to enforce Federal laws only.)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize Veterans Administration police officers to enforce State and local traffic laws on Veterans Administration property.
